name: BEESWAX
description:
Made in one week for the GameDevHQ community jam!

You are a bumblebee! Collect honey! Kill bad guys! Save the princess bee!

How to play: 

Shoot or jump on enemies to damage them! Tap or hold the jump button to fly. Collect honey and finish the level as quickly as possible for a high score!

Shoot - Right Trigger or left mouse

Jump - A button or space or right Mouse

Game plays best with a controller.
